name: Kankun
description: Besides vitamins and minerals, kangkong (Kankun or water spinach) has a large presence of dietary fibers and antioxidants. Kangkong is relatively high in beta-carotene, natural antioxidants, protein, carbohydrates, and dietary fibers. Kangkong is also extremely rich in electrolytes, such as sodium and potassium.
